languages.text: {n}Хормейстер запрокидывает голову к потолку.{/n} "Нам было дано узреть свет Императора — безупречный и опаляющий". {n}Благоговейная улыбка ложится на уста астропата.{/n} "Это меняет тебя, наносит непоправимые раны, лишает зрения, но взамен... ты приобщаешься к величию. Его присутствие в наших душах укрепляет их в противостоянии злокозненным силам".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Хормейстер запрокидывает голову к потолку.{/n} "Нам было дано узреть свет Императора — безупречный и опаляющий". {n}Благоговейная улыбка ложится на уста астропата.{/n} "Это меняет тебя. Наносит непоправимые раны, лишает зрения, но взамен...
ты приобщаешься к величию. Его присутствие в наших душах укрепляет их в противостоянии злокозненным силам".

languages.text: {n}He throws his head back.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits his lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."
languages.original_text: {n}Хормейстер запрокидывает голову к потолку.{/n} "Нам было дано узреть свет Императора — безупречный и опаляющий". {n}Благоговейная улыбка ложится на уста астропата.{/n} "Это меняет тебя, наносит непоправимые раны, лишает зрения, но взамен... ты приобщаешься к величию. Его присутствие в наших душах укрепляет их в противостоянии злокозненным силам".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Choirmaster throws his head up toward the ceiling.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits the astropath's lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

languages.text: {n}Alza la cabeza.{/n} «Se nos otorgó el privilegio de presenciar la luz del Emperador, una luz inmaculada y abrasadora». {n}Una sonrisa curva sus labios.{/n} «Eso cambia a cualquier persona. Hiere de forma irreparable y te arrebata la vista, pero, a cambio... entras en comunión con la grandeza. Su presencia en nuestras almas las refuerza a la hora de enfrentarnos contra los poderes malignos».
languages.original_text: {n}He throws his head back.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits his lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alza la cabeza.{/n} «Se nos otorgó el privilegio de presenciar la luz del Emperador, una luz inmaculada y abrasadora». {n}Una sonrisa curva sus labios.{/n} «Eso cambia a cualquier persona. Hiere de forma irreparable y te arrebata la vista, pero, a cambio... entras en comunión con la grandeza. Su presencia en nuestras almas las refuerza a la hora de enfrentarnos contra los poderes malignos».

languages.text: {n}男は首を後ろに反らす。{/n}「私たちは、完璧で焦げ付くような、皇帝陛下の御光を目にする特権を与えられた」{n}信心深い笑みが唇に浮かぶ。{/n}「あの光は人を変える。とんでもない傷を負って、視力も奪われるが、それと引き換えに…偉大な存在と交われるのだ。私たちの魂にあるあのお方の存在は、邪悪な力に立ち向かうとき、私たちの魂を強くしてくれる」
languages.original_text: {n}He throws his head back.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits his lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は首を後ろに反らす。{/n}「私たちは、完璧で焦げ付くような、皇帝陛下の御光を目にする特権を与えられた」{n}信心深い笑みが唇に浮かぶ。{/n}「あの光は人を変える。とんでもない傷を負って、視力も奪われるが、それと引き換えに…偉大な存在と交われるのだ。私たちの魂にあるあのお方の存在は、邪悪な力に立ち向かうとき、私たちの魂を強くしてくれる」

languages.text: {n}他抬起了头。{/n}“我们有幸见到了帝皇的光芒，那是无比炽热、完美无瑕的明光。”{n}他嘴角露出了虔诚的微笑。{/n}“这改变了我们。尽管它对我们造成了无法弥补的伤害，夺走了我们的视力，但作为回报……我们可以与伟大的神明进行交流。祂存在于我们的灵魂之中，是我们对抗邪恶力量的坚实后盾。”
languages.original_text: {n}He throws his head back.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits his lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}他抬起了头。{/n}“我们有幸见到了帝皇的光芒，那是无比炽热、完美无瑕的明光。”{n}他嘴角露出了虔诚的微笑。{/n}“这改变了我们。尽管它对我们造成了无法弥补的伤害，夺走了我们的视力，但作为回报……我们可以与伟大的神明进行交流。祂存在于我们的灵魂之中，是我们对抗邪恶力量的坚实后盾。”

languages.text: {n}Er wirft den Kopf in den Nacken.{/n} "Wir haben das Privileg erhalten, das Licht des Imperators sehen zu dürfen, ein makelloses und gleißendes Licht." {n}Ein frommes Lächeln legt sich auf seine Lippen.{/n} "Das verändert einen. Es verwundet einen unwiederbringlich, es raubt einem das Augenlicht, doch im Tausch dafür ... tritt man mit wahrer Erhabenheit in Kontakt. Seine Anwesenheit in unseren Seelen stärkt sie, wenn wir uns gegen bösartige Mächte stellen."
languages.original_text: {n}He throws his head back.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits his lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wirft den Kopf in den Nacken.{/n} "Wir haben das Privileg erhalten, das Licht des Imperators sehen zu dürfen, ein makelloses und gleißendes Licht." {n}Ein frommes Lächeln legt sich auf seine Lippen.{/n} "Das verändert einen. Es verwundet einen unwiederbringlich, es raubt einem das Augenlicht, doch im Tausch dafür ... tritt man mit wahrer Erhabenheit in Kontakt. Seine Anwesenheit in unseren Seelen stärkt sie, wenn wir uns gegen bösartige Mächte stellen."

languages.text: {n}Il rejette la tête en arrière.{/n} « On nous a accordé le privilège de voir de nos yeux la lumière de l'Empereur, une flamme aussi brûlante qu'immaculée, {n}dit-il en esquissant un sourire empreint de piété.{/n} C'est une expérience dont on ressort à jamais changé. Une épreuve qui vous laisse à jamais meurtri et aveugle, mais en échange... on a la chance inouïe de communier avec Sa grandeur. Son auguste présence fortifie nos âmes à l'heure où nous bravons les forces du mal. »
languages.original_text: {n}He throws his head back.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits his lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il rejette la tête en arrière.{/n} « On nous a accordé le privilège de voir de nos yeux la lumière de l'Empereur, une flamme aussi brûlante qu'immaculée, {n}dit-il en esquissant un sourire empreint de piété.{/n} C'est une expérience dont on ressort à jamais changé. Une épreuve qui vous laisse à jamais meurtri et aveugle, mais en échange... on a la chance inouïe de communier avec Sa grandeur. Son auguste présence fortifie nos âmes à l'heure où nous bravons les forces du mal. »

languages.text: {n}Başını geriye atıyor.{/n} "Bize İmparator'un ışığını seyre dalma ayrıcalığı bahşedildi. O ışık ki kusurdan yoksundur, hiddetle yanar." {n}Dudaklarına dindar bir gülümseme konuyor.{/n} "Bu tecrübe insanı değiştiriyor. Onarılamaz bir şekilde yaralıyor, gözleri görmez kılıyor ama karşılığında... Yücelikle iletişim kuruyorsunuz. O'nun ruhlarımızdaki varlığı, kötücül güçlerin karşısında dikilirken ruhlarımıza kuvvet veriyor."
languages.original_text: {n}He throws his head back.{/n} "We were given the privilege to behold the Emperor's light, a light flawless and searing." {n}A pious smile visits his lips.{/n} "That changes you. It wounds you irreparably, it takes your eyesight, but in exchange... you commune with greatness. His presence in our souls fortifies them as we stand against malicious powers."
